thread.title: Wal-Mart names Brett Biggs as next chief financial officer - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Wal-Mart names Brett Biggs as next chief financial officer - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: Wal-Mart names Brett Biggs as next chief financial officer - Yahoo Finance
text:
NEW YORK (AP) -- Wal-Mart Stores named Brett Biggs as the retailer's next chief financial officer. He will replace Charles Holley who is retiring at the end of the year.
Biggs, 47, has been CFO and executive vice president of Wal-Mart's international unit since 2014. He has held several roles at Wal-Mart since joining the company in 2000.
Holley, who is 59 years old, has been Wal-Mart's CFO for nearly five years. Biggs will take over the role on Dec. 31. Holley with stay with the company until Jan. 31, 2016, to help with the transition.
Shares of Wal-Mart Stores Inc., based in Bentonville, Arkansas, added 8 cents to $66.96 in morning trading Friday.
Consumer Discretionary Wal-Mart Stores
